data.Name: Vitargent
data.Tagline: Vitargent (International) Biotechnology is a bio-chem testing services
data.About:
Established in 2010, Vitargent (International) Biotechnology Limited has a vision of "Smarter Testing, Safer Products, Better World"â€‹. We develop bio-testing technologies that include transgenic medaka and zebrafish embryo toxicity testing technologies.

In 2013, Vitargent was accredited for the international standard ISO17025 and became the only test centre in Asia that can provide fish embryo toxicity (FET) testing with results officially recognised in more than 100 countries and economies.

We are the proud winner of the Grand Prix at the International Exhibition of Inventions of Geneva (2015).  2015 Davos Global Innovation Pioneer, HSBC Young Entrepreneur Award, Second Runner-up of Lee Kuan Yew Global Business Plan Competition, Middle East International Invention Fair Gold Medal, WIPO Gold Medal for Inventors, Korea International Invention Exhibition-Gold Award and Hong Kong Awards for Industries-Technological Achievement Award.

Based in Hong Kong with licensed laboratories in Europe and Taiwan, serving top-notch testing organisations, governments, major international cosmetics companies and catering groups around the world.

Learn more at www.vitargent.com
